author: mfojtik
msg: Create subpackages in the RPM spec file.
These subpackages will bring in all of the dependencies
necessary to run the core to connect to the various
backends.
Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalance@redhat.com>

author: mfojtik
msg: Bugfixes to the fedora spec file.
There are a few changes here:
1)  Remove the patch listings - these are already in the
upstream sources, so no longer necessary
2)  Add some minor cleanups, especially in the area of
prepping an "installation" area.
3)  Whitespace fixes
4)  Remove deltacloudd and add deltacloudd-fedora, to match
what we are doing with fedora.
Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalance@redhat.com>
